response.overview: Thirty incredible races at the most iconic race circuits in Britain and a grid made up of some of the most successful drivers in BTCC history: Buckle up for over six hours of non-stop entertainment. If you were given a blank sheet of paper and challenged to come up with a better, more intense, unpredictable and exhilarating motor racing championship you would be hard pushed to improve upon the Dunlop MSA British Touring Car Championship. Thereâ€™s never a single dull moment in BTCC and even amongst all the classic years of racing there are few that were more tense and thrilling than 2015. After a long season of racing at course like Knockhill, Croft, Thruxton and Silverstone how can you ask for more than the whole championship being decided in the very last lap of the very last race?
response.title: BTCC 2015 Review
